name: Dropship: United Peace Force
synopsis: Deploy and destroy using cutting-edge Dropship technology to reinforce peace in worldwide hot spots. After loading your Dropship with deadly combat vehicles, you can fly, drive, and shoot your way through an expansive enemy-infested terrain. Your decisions affect the outcome as your wingmen and ground forces rely on your guidance and support. Now, uncover a tale of military might and political intrigue as you and your copilot take out tactical targets to cripple enemy strongholds.
